snippet: Residents of the medieval villages of the Cinque Terre in Italy are working to restore the Unesco World Heritage site after a devastating October storm.
abstract: Residents of the medieval villages of the Cinque Terre in Italy, a Unesco World Heritage site, are undertaking an ambitious restoration effort following a devastating storm in October 2011.
lead_paragraph: Residents of the medieval villages of the Cinque Terre in Italy are working to restore the Unesco World Heritage site after a devastating October storm.

headline.seo: In Hills of Liguria, a Struggle for Restoration After a Storm
headline.main: In Liguria’s Coastal Hills, a Storm’s Fury Brings a Struggle for Restoration
headline.print_headline: In Liguria’s Coastal Hills, A Storm’s Fury Brings A Struggle for Restoration

keywords.value: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
keywords.name: organizations
